biotools.summary: Breast cancer gene-expression miner (bc-GenExMiner) 4.5 is a mining module computes breast cancer differential gene expression analyses. It is a statistical mining tool of published annotated breast cancer transcriptomic data (DNA microarrays and RNA-seq). It offers the possibility to explore gene-expression of genes of interest in breast cancer.
